name: 菲利普·肯尼迪·约翰逊
name_full: 菲利普·肯尼迪·约翰逊 Phillip Kennedy Johnson
introduction: Phillip Kennedy Johnson is an Eisner-nominated writer and musician living in the Washington, DC/Baltimore region. Best known for his work on Superman, Action Comics, Alien, Marvel Zombies: Resurrection, and 007, his comics work has been published by DC, Marvel, BOOM! Studios, Dynamite, Archaia, IDW, Aftershock, and Scout Comics. He is the creator of comic series The Fellspyre Chronicles from DC Black Label, Last Sons of America, Warlords of Appalachia, Smoketown, and more.Outside of writing, Johnson is a Master Sergeant in the United States Army, and tours the continental United States as a trumpet player with The U.S. Army Field Band of Washington, DC. Prior to joining the Army Field Band, he toured the world with the Glenn Miller Orchestra from 2004-2005, and has performed with the Moscow Ballet, the Dallas Opera, Washington Symphonic Brass, the Lexington Philharmonic, and the Benny Goodman Orchestra.
